long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tracks the carbon emissions by monitoring http traffic and the current carbon intensity of the servers the traffic is uploaded from. 

Repo is open source (and still work in progress) https://github.com/GustavLeth/Sustainable_Software_Engineering. 

It's a project for the course Sustainable Software Engineering at TU Delft in the spring of 2023.
